metadata.synopsis: An one-shot AD that one of the patrons plays during the combat with fake Dribbles the Clown. The character cries for help.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A, Circus. Start the combat with the clown, the AD will be played on the player's turn in combat.

0.speaker: Cleet
0.context: NodeContext: Scared and upset at seeing a childhood favourite of his, dribbles the clown, begin murdering people
